packages.name: MavensMate
packages.description: MavensMate for Sublime Text is a plugin that aims to replicate the functionality of the Eclipse-based Force.com IDE.
packages.author: joeferraro

osx.release_notes: Multiple workspaces, health check enhancements, custom salesforce urls for projects, various UI/UX updates, various bug fixes (OSX users: be sure MM.app *AND* MM for ST3 plugin are both updated)
